covid_consent.consent_error: Please review and provide your consent
covid_consent.heading: Covid Consent
covid_consent.missed_check_in: You missed the check-in period. Please contact us at contact@carereq.com
covid_consent.missed_check_out: You missed the check-out period. Please contact us at contact@carereq.com
covid_consent.not_close_error: It seems you are not close enough. Try again when you reach the shift location
covid_consent.not_close_error1: It seems you are not close enough. Please contact us at contact@carereq.com
covid_consent.p1: I am not experiencing any symptoms of illness such as cough, shortness of breath or difficulty breathing, fever, chills, repeated shaking with chills, muscle pain, headache, sore throat, or new loss of taste or smell.
covid_consent.p2: I have not traveled internationally or to a highly impacted area within the last 14 days.
covid_consent.p3: I do not believe I have been exposed to someone with a suspected and/or confirmed case of the Coronavirus/COVID-19.
covid_consent.p4: I have not been diagnosed with Coronavirus/Covid-19 by provincial or local public health authorities.
covid_consent.p5: I agree to use a mask, face shield, gloves & follow public health guidelines during the entire service.

dashboard.no_recurring_day_requests_available: There are no recurring day requests available
dashboard.no_request: There's no request based on the filter criteria
dashboard.no_single_day_requests_available: There are no single day requests available

documents.upload_docs: Upload the picture or attach the document

login.agree_to_terms: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our
login.welcome_message: Sign in to CareReq as a Provider

oops.welcome_subtitle: We are looking forward to helping you with your personal support needs. CareReq services are available only in certain areas in GTA and will be available in your location shortly. Please contact us at contact@carereq.com for more details.

payment.register_get_paid: You need to register on stripe to get paid

waiting.waiting_subtitle: If you have any questions please feel free to reach out to us at contact@carereq.com
waiting.waiting_title: We are verifying your documents. We will reach out to you if we             need more information.
